install.name: yoo_expo
install.author: YOOtheme
install.description: Expo is the December 2010 theme of the YOOtheme club. It is based on YOOtheme's Warp CMS theme framework. NOTE: It is not free or public. This theme is for members of the YOOtheme club only.

param.name: allow_dynamic_preset
param.label: Allow dynamic preset
param.description: Allow dynamic preset.

param.name: style
param.label: Template Style
param.description: Style used for template

param.name: background
param.label: Template Background
param.description: Background used for template

param.name: wrapper
param.label: Template Wrapper
param.description: Texture used for template wrapper

param.name: font
param.label: Template Font
param.description: Font used for template

param.name: template_width
param.label: Template Width
param.description: Set the template width.

param.name: template_width_unit
param.label: Template Width Unit
param.description: Set the template width length unit to pixel or percent. For example use 90% to get a fluid layout.

param.name: left_width
param.label: Left Width
param.description: Set the width of the #left column in pixels. Don't forget to modify existent background images to match the new width if needed.

param.name: left_space
param.label: Left Space
param.description: Set the space between the #left and #main column in pixels.

param.name: right_width
param.label: Right Width
param.description: Set the width of the #right column in pixels. Don't forget to modify existent background images to match the new width if needed.

param.name: right_space
param.label: Right Space
param.description: Set the space between the #main and #right column in pixels.

param.name: contentleft_width
param.label: Contentleft Width
param.description: Set the width of the #contentleft column in pixels. Don't forget to modify existent background images to match the new width if needed.

param.name: contentleft_space
param.label: Contentleft Space
param.description: Set the space between the #contentleft and #content column in pixels.

param.name: contentright_width
param.label: Contentright Width
param.description: Set the width of the #contentright column in pixels. Don't forget to modify existent background images to match the new width if needed.

param.name: contentright_space
param.label: Contentright Space
param.description: Set the space between the #content and #contentright column in pixels.

param.name: menu_width
param.label: Drop Down Column Width
param.description: Set the width of one column of the drop down menu in pixels.

param.name: date
param.label: Show Date
param.description: Show/Hide the date.

param.name: load_googlefonts
param.label: Enable Google Fonts
param.description: Enable/Disable the Google Fonts.

param.name: compression
param.label: Compression
param.description: Select the compression mode: Minify and combine templates css and javascript into a single file. Compress these files with gzip. Use Data URIs instead of images to remove all image file requests.

param.name: verify
param.label: Verify Files
param.description: Detects and shows all template file modifications
